definitions.text: a tone that is a component of a complex sound
any of a series of musical tones whose frequencies are integral multiples of the frequency of a fundamental
of or relating to harmony as distinct from melody and rhythm; - Ralph Hill
examples: subtleties of harmonic change and tonality

definitions.text: of or relating to the branch of acoustics that studies the composition of musical sounds
examples: the sound of the resonating cavity cannot be the only determinant of the harmonic response

definitions.text: relating to vibrations that occur as a result of vibrations in a nearby body
